        public boolean canBeInitialised()
        Description copied from interface: FlinkComponent
        This check is needed in order to determine whether all requirements for a Flink Component (DataStream) are satisfied in order to initialise it. This is necessary in this integration since Flink Streaming applies eager datastream generation based on transformations.
        Specified by:
        canBeInitialised in interface FlinkComponent

      • connectInputShuffleStream

        public ProcessingItem connectInputShuffleStream(Stream inputStream)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessingItem
        Connects this processing item in a round robin fashion. The events will be distributed evenly between the instantiated processing items.
        Specified by:
        connectInputShuffleStream in interface ProcessingItem
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • connectInputKeyStream

        public ProcessingItem connectInputKeyStream(Stream inputStream)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessingItem
        Connects this processing item taking the event key into account. Events will be routed to the processing item according to the modulus of its key and the paralellism level. Ex.: key = 5 and paralellism = 2, 5 mod 2 = 1. Processing item responsible for 1 will receive this event.
        Specified by:
        connectInputKeyStream in interface ProcessingItem
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem

      • connectInputAllStream

        public ProcessingItem connectInputAllStream(Stream inputStream)
        Description copied from interface: ProcessingItem
        Connects this processing item to the stream in a broadcast fashion. All processing items of this type will receive copy of the original event.
        Specified by:
        connectInputAllStream in interface ProcessingItem
        Parameters:
        inputStream - Stream to connect this processing item.
        Returns:
        ProcessingItem
